Text: Hell yeah man this is a good flick.

Mr.Hardstyle, try downloading and installing GOM player. It is the best video player around for many people. I play all videos with it.
Get it from here, http://www.gomlab.com/eng/ and enjoy!

Mr Hardstyle,
